title: Runite ore

Item ID451

Runite ore can be mined at level 85 Mining providing 125 Mining experience. After a runite rock is mined, it will take twelve minutes until it reappears. Runite ore is used with eight coal to smelt runite bars. Smelting a runite bar gives 50 Smithing experience.

Wearing either superior mining gloves or expert mining gloves while mining a runite rock grants a 12.5% chance for the rock to not deplete upon mining a runite ore, allowing you to mine an additional ore before depleting.

Contents

  • 1 Ore chance
  • 2 Mining Info
  • 3 Products
  • 4 Locations
  • 5 Item sources
    • 5.1 Shop locations

Ore chance[edit | edit source]

At 99 mining, runite ore has a 19/256 chance of depletion every 3 ticks (1.8 seconds), when using a rune pickaxe. In the case of a rune pickaxe, the expected amount of time for success is 256/19 * 3 ticks, roughly 24.25 seconds.

For the median time to success, consider that the chance of not getting the rock. x rolls is (237/256)^x. Solve for (237/256)^x = 0.5, you get x = 8.99 approximately. So median time (i.e. the time after which 50% of rocks would be mined) is 8.99 * 3 ticks, which is about 16.18 seconds.

{{External|rs|rsc}} {{HasMMG|Mining runite ore}} {{Otheruses|the ore|the rock it's extracted from|Runite rock}} {{Infobox Item |name = Runite ore |image = [[File:Runite ore.png]] |release = [[13 August]] [[2001]] |update = Wilderness system online |members = No |quest = No |tradeable = Yes |placeholder = Yes |equipable = No |stackable = No |noteable = Yes |destroy = Drop |examine = This needs refining. |value = 3200 |weight = 2.267 |exchange = Yes |id = 451 }} [[File:Runite ore detail.png|left|130px]] '''Runite ore''' can be mined at level 85 [[Mining]] providing 125 Mining experience. After a [[runite rock]] is mined, it will take twelve minutes until it reappears. Runite ore is used with eight [[coal]] to smelt [[runite bar|runite bars]]. Smelting a runite bar gives 50 [[Smithing]] experience. Wearing either [[superior mining gloves]] or [[expert mining gloves]] while mining a runite rock grants a 12.5% chance for the rock to not deplete upon mining a runite ore, allowing you to mine an additional ore before depleting. === Ore chance === At 99 mining, runite ore has a 19/256 chance of depletion every 3 ticks (1.8 seconds), when using a rune pickaxe. In the case of a rune pickaxe, the expected amount of time for success is 256/19 * 3 ticks, roughly 24.25 seconds. For the median time to success, consider that the chance of ''not'' getting the rock. ''x'' rolls is (237/256)^''x''. Solve for (237/256)^''x'' = 0.5, you get ''x'' = 8.99 approximately. So median time (i.e. the time after which 50% of rocks would be mined) is 8.99 * 3 ticks, which is about 16.18 seconds. ==Mining Info== {{Mining info |name = Runite Rock |level = 85 |xp = 125 |rock = [[Runite rock]] |tool = [[Pickaxe]] |time = 12 minutes
6 minutes in Mining Guild }} ==Products== {{Uses material list|Runite ore}} ==Locations== '''See [[runite rock]]''' ==Item sources== {{Drop sources|Runite ore}} ===Shop locations=== {{Store locations list|Runite ore}} {{Rune equipment}} {{Mining}} [[Category:Ores]] [[Category:Needs skilling success chart]]
